title: At a glance widget not showing all the options
content:
When I long press on at a glance widget i get only two options work profile and calendar events. What happened to rest of the options, they are not showing up. I don't have upcoming flight information, traffic information, reminders etc. 

is there a way to bring those settings back? and did google deleted those options for some reason?
category: Homescreen and Launcher, Google Pixel 4 XL
